resources.string: Welcome to the Hangman game!\nWho has not played this game in\nschool?

Will you be able to find the secret
word before the man get hanged?
If you can't find a word, don't
worry, you can use hints that will
help you discover the word.
There are three game modes which is you can change according to your skill level.

Welcome to the Hangman game!
Who has not played this game in
school?

Will you be able to find the secret
word before the man get hanged?
If you can't find a word, don't
worry, you can use hints that will
help you discover the word.
There are three game modes which is you can change according to your skill level.\n\nThe difficulty is increasing step by step according to levels. You can up your level by win the game five times.
